member.name: T:LipingShare.Asn1Editor.NamespaceDoc
member.summary:
ASN.1* DER** encoded data is widely used in digital security protocols. The encoded data is not readable by regular text editor. The ASN.1 Editor is designed to view and modify the encoded data easily.
ASN.1 Editor doesnâ€™t do any schema checking. The user needs to make sure the edited data conform to certain constrains (i.e. OCSP request or Key Info structure).
ASN.1: Abstract Syntax Notation One. DER: Distinguished Encoding Rules.
